gvr:validationOverview.gvr:additionalMetadata: This report is a partial report ; only constraints of severity higher or equals to WARNING are included. The full report can be requested using severity parameter at INFO level.

gvr:constraint.gvr:constraintDescription: dtr1-13-II: Lower case UUID "fc21dc59-43d5-4bb0-acc7-3601784bfbc0" found in @root. UUIDs SHALL, under official HL7 V3 Datatypes Release 1 (and 2) rules, have upper case hexadecimal digits A-F. RFC 4122 and HL7 FHIR state lower case UUID display.
